name: The Great Escape (itch)
description:
The Great Escape is another game from brazilian indie game developer XiNFiNiTY Games.

The game is an Infinity Runner, where the player guides a spaceship through a narrow tunnel filled with incoming obstacles. Maneuverability is pretty nice, but it will be necessary great reflexes and a lot of patient for this game, considered very hard for it own devs. Great Escape is procedural, the more you advance harder the hazards become. The main goal is achieve high score and record your name in our world leaderboards.

Follow us: facebook.com/xinfinitygames
